languages.text: От души насладившись приятной компанией, оборванцы проводят вас до каюты старшего по отсеку. Работяги просят доложить о затерявше{mf|мся|йся} госпо{mf|дине|же} с верхних палуб — уж слишком ваша выправка и манеры выделяются среди простого люда. Когда же вы вновь показываетесь на мостике, Мастер вокса восхваляет Императора Человечества и объясняет, что вы попали в аномалию, заставляющую людей на корабле непостижимым образом меняться друг с другом местами. За Лорд-капитаном тут же направили спасательный отряд, но ваши друзья с нижних палуб помогли вам выбраться раньше.

traits.locale_text: От души насладившись приятной компанией, оборванцы проводят вас до каюты старшего по отсеку. Работяги просят доложить о затерявше{mf|мся|йся} госпо{mf|дине|же} с верхних палуб — уж слишком ваша выправка и манеры выделяются среди простого люда. Когда же вы вновь показываетесь на мостике, Мастер Вокса восхваляет Императора Человечества и объясняет, что вы попали в аномалию, заставляющую людей на корабле непостижимым образом меняться друг с другом местами. За Лорд-капитаном тут же направили спасательный отряд, но ваши друзья с нижних палуб помогли вам выбраться раньше.

languages.text: The ragged people, who have thoroughly enjoyed your pleasant company, walk with you to the bay supervisor's cabin. The workers ask the supervisor to report a stray noble from the upper decks. Your poise and manners do make you stand out from the humble denizens of the lower decks. When you are restored to the bridge, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity and explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to retrieve {mf|Your Lordship|Your Ladyship}, but your friends from the lower decks have already helped the Lord Captain back to where {mf|he|she} belongs.
languages.original_text: От души насладившись приятной компанией, оборванцы проводят вас до каюты старшего по отсеку. Работяги просят доложить о затерявше{mf|мся|йся} госпо{mf|дине|же} с верхних палуб — уж слишком ваша выправка и манеры выделяются среди простого люда. Когда же вы вновь показываетесь на мостике, Мастер вокса восхваляет Императора Человечества и объясняет, что вы попали в аномалию, заставляющую людей на корабле непостижимым образом меняться друг с другом местами. За Лорд-капитаном тут же направили спасательный отряд, но ваши друзья с нижних палуб помогли вам выбраться раньше.

traits.locale_text: The ragged people, who've thoroughly enjoyed your pleasant company, walk with you to the chamber supervisor's quarters. The workers ask him to report a stray nobby from the upper decks. Your poise and manners do make you stand out among the common folk. When you're on the bridge again, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity and explains that you've been trapped in an anomaly that's been making the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to fetch the Lord Captain, but your friends from the lower decks have already helped you get out.

The ragged people, who've thoroughly enjoyed your pleasant company, walk with you to the chamber supervisor's quarters. The workers ask him to report a stray nobby from the upper decks. Your poise and manners do make you stand out among the common folk. When you're on the bridge again, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity and explains that you've been trapped in an anomaly that's been making the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to fetch the Lord Captain, but your friends from the lower decks have already helped you get out.

The ragged people, who've thoroughly enjoyed your pleasant company, walk with you to the chamber supervisor's quarters. The workers ask him to report a stray noble from the upper decks. Your poise and manners do make you stand out among the common folk. When you're on the bridge again, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity and explains that you've been trapped in an anomaly that's been making the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to fetch the Lord Captain, but your friends from the lower decks have already helped you escape.

The ragged people, who have thoroughly enjoyed the Rogue Trader's pleasant company, walk with {mf|him|her} to the bay supervisor's cabin. The workers ask the supervisor to report a stray noble from the upper decks. The Rogue Trader's poise and manners do make {mf|him|her} stand out from the humble denizens of the lower decks. When {mf|he|she} is restored to the bridge, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity and explains that the Rogue Trader was trapped in an anomaly that made the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to retrieve {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, but {mf|his|her} friends from the lower decks have already helped the Lord Captain back to where {mf|he|she} belongs.

The ragged people, who have thoroughly enjoyed the Rogue Trader's pleasant company, walk with {mf|him|her} to the bay supervisor's cabin. The workers ask the supervisor to report a stray noble from the upper decks. The Rogue Trader's poise and manners do make {mf|him|her} stand out from the humble denizens of the lower decks. When {mf|he|she} is restored to the bridge, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity and explains that the Rogue Trader was trapped in an anomaly that made the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to retrieve {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, but {mf|his|her} friends from the lower decks have already helped the Lord Captain back to where {mf|he|she} belongs.

The ragged people, who have thoroughly enjoyed your pleasant company, walk with you to the bay supervisor's cabin. The workers ask the supervisor to report a stray noble from the upper decks. Your poise and manners do make you stand out from the humble denizens of the lower decks. When you are restored to the bridge, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity and explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to retrieve {mf|Your Lordship|Your Ladyship}, but your friends from the lower decks have already helped the Lord Captain back to where {mf|he|she} belongs.

languages.text: 这些衣衫褴褛的人充分享受了你的愉快陪伴。他们与你一起来到了甲板主管的小屋。工人们要求主管向上级报告，说有位来自上层甲板的贵族迷路到了这个地方。你温文尔雅的风度与举止，确实让你看起来与下层甲板的卑微居民截然不同。当你再次回到舰桥时，音阵大师立刻赞美起了帝皇。维格迪斯解释说，刚刚飞船上发生了异常情况，船上的一部分人莫名其妙地交换了位置。发生异常情况之后，军官们立刻组织了一支救援队去寻找失踪的行商浪人，但你在下层甲板的朋友们，已经帮助他们的舰长大人回到了{mf|他|她}该去的地方。
languages.original_text: The ragged people, who have thoroughly enjoyed your pleasant company, walk with you to the bay supervisor's cabin. The workers ask the supervisor to report a stray noble from the upper decks. Your poise and manners do make you stand out from the humble denizens of the lower decks. When you are restored to the bridge, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity and explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to retrieve {mf|Your Lordship|Your Ladyship}, but your friends from the lower decks have already helped the Lord Captain back to where {mf|he|she} belongs.

traits.locale_text: 这些衣衫褴褛的人充分享受了你的愉快陪伴。他们与你一起来到了甲板主管的小屋。工人们要求主管向上级报告，说有位来自上层甲板的贵族迷路到了这个地方。你温文尔雅的风度与举止，确实让你看起来与下层甲板的卑微居民截然不同。当你再次回到舰桥时，音阵大师立刻赞美起了帝皇。维格迪斯解释说，刚刚飞船上发生了异常情况，船上的一部分人莫名其妙地交换了位置。发生异常情况之后，军官们立刻组织了一支救援队去寻找失踪的行商浪人，但你在下层甲板的朋友们，已经帮助他们的舰长大人回到了{mf|他|她}该去的地方。

languages.text: La gente harapienta, que ha disfrutado de tu agradable compañía, te acompaña a la cabina del supervisor de la bahía. Los trabajadores piden al supervisor que informe de un{mf||a} noble perdid{mf|o|a} de las cubiertas superiores. Tu postura y tus modales hacen que destaques entre los humildes residentes de las cubiertas inferiores. Cuando vuelves al puente, la maestra de vocos da las gracias al Emperador de la Humanidad y explica que habías sido atrapad{mf|o|a} por una anomalía que hacía que la gente cambiara sus posiciones en la nave. Se envió de inmediato un escuadrón de rescate en tu busca, pero han sido tus amigos de las cubiertas inferiores los que han devuelto a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán a su legítimo puesto.
languages.original_text: The ragged people, who have thoroughly enjoyed your pleasant company, walk with you to the bay supervisor's cabin. The workers ask the supervisor to report a stray noble from the upper decks. Your poise and manners do make you stand out from the humble denizens of the lower decks. When you are restored to the bridge, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity and explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to retrieve {mf|Your Lordship|Your Ladyship}, but your friends from the lower decks have already helped the Lord Captain back to where {mf|he|she} belongs.

traits.locale_text: La gente harapienta, que ha disfrutado de la agradable compañía de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, {mf|le|la} acompañan a la cabina del supervisor de la bahía. Los trabajadores piden al supervisor que informe de un{mf||a} noble perdid{mf|o|a} de las cubiertas superiores. La postura y los modales de{mf|l| la} Comerciante hacen que destaque entre los humildes residentes de las cubiertas inferiores. Cuando vuelve al puente, la maestra de vocos da las gracias al Emperador de la Humanidad y explica que estaba atrapad{mf|o|a} en una anomalía que hacía que la gente cambiara sus posiciones en la nave. Se envió de inmediato un escuadrón de rescate en su busca, pero han sido sus amigos de las cubiertas inferiores los que han devuelto a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán a su legítimo puesto.

languages.text: 布きれをまとった人々、あなたの快き友人となった者たちは、一緒に船倉の管理人がいる船室へ歩いて行く。一同は、上甲板から迷い込んだ貴族の件を報告するよう管理人に依頼する。あなたの落ち着きと作法は、下甲板の目立たない住人たちから一目置かれる存在だと。艦橋に戻ると、マスター・ヴォクスは人類の皇帝に賛辞を送る。そして、船内の人々が不可解に入れ替わる異変にあなたが巻き込まれていたことを説明する。すぐに救助隊を派遣したが、すでに下甲板の友人らがロード・キャプテンが戻るべき場所に帰れるよう助けてくれていたのだと説明した。
languages.original_text: The ragged people, who have thoroughly enjoyed your pleasant company, walk with you to the bay supervisor's cabin. The workers ask the supervisor to report a stray noble from the upper decks. Your poise and manners do make you stand out from the humble denizens of the lower decks. When you are restored to the bridge, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity and explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to retrieve {mf|Your Lordship|Your Ladyship}, but your friends from the lower decks have already helped the Lord Captain back to where {mf|he|she} belongs.

traits.locale_text: 布きれをまとった人々、ローグトレーダーの快き友人となった者たちは、一緒に船倉の管理人がいる船室へ歩いて行く。一同は、上甲板から迷い込んだ貴族の件を報告するよう管理人に依頼する。ローグトレーダーの落ち着きと作法は、下甲板の目立たない住人たちから一目置かれる存在だと。艦橋に戻ると、マスター・ヴォクスは人類の皇帝に賛辞を送る。そして、船内の人々が不可解に入れ替わる異変にローグトレーダーが巻き込まれていたことを説明する。すぐに救助隊を派遣したが、すでに下甲板の友人らがロード・キャプテンが戻るべき場所に帰れるよう助けてくれていたのだと説明した。

languages.text: Die zerlumpten Bewohner der Unterdecks, denen deine angenehme Gesellschaft große Freude bereitet hat, bringen dich zur Kabine des Aufsehers. Die Arbeiter bitten den Aufseher, zu melden, dass {mf|ein Adliger|eine Adlige} von den Oberdecks sich hier unten verirrt hat. Durch dein Auftreten und Verhalten hebst du dich tatsächlich von den bescheidenen Bewohnern der Unterdecks ab. Als du auf die Brücke zurückkehrst, lobt die Voxmeisterin den Imperator der Menschheit und erklärt, dass du in einer Anomalie gefangen warst, durch die Personen auf dem Schiff aus unerklärlichen Gründen die Plätze getauscht haben. Es wurde augenblicklich ein Rettungstrupp entsandt, um dich zu retten, doch deine Freunde von den Unterdecks hatten dir bereits geholfen, wieder an denen rechtmäßigen Platz zurückzukehren.
languages.original_text: The ragged people, who have thoroughly enjoyed your pleasant company, walk with you to the bay supervisor's cabin. The workers ask the supervisor to report a stray noble from the upper decks. Your poise and manners do make you stand out from the humble denizens of the lower decks. When you are restored to the bridge, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity and explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to retrieve {mf|Your Lordship|Your Ladyship}, but your friends from the lower decks have already helped the Lord Captain back to where {mf|he|she} belongs.

traits.locale_text: Die zerlumpten Bewohner der Unterdecks, denen deine angenehme Gesellschaft große Freude bereitet hat, bringen dich zur Kabine des Aufsehers. Die Arbeiter bitten den Aufseher, zu melden, dass {mf|ein Adliger|eine Adlige} von den Oberdecks sich hier unten verirrt hat. Durch dein Auftreten und Verhalten hebst du dich tatsächlich von den bescheidenen Bewohnern der Unterdecks ab. Als du auf die Brücke zurückkehrst, lobt die Voxmeisterin den Imperator der Menschheit und erklärt, dass du in einer Anomalie gefangen warst, durch die Personen auf dem Schiff aus unerklärlichen Gründen die Plätze getauscht haben. Es wurde augenblicklich ein Rettungstrupp entsandt, um dich zu retten, doch deine Freunde von den Unterdecks hatten dir bereits geholfen, wieder an denen rechtmäßigen Platz zurückzukehren.

Die zerlumpten Bewohner der Unterdecks, denen die angenehme Gesellschaft {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} große Freude bereitet hat, bringen {mf|ihn|sie} zur Kabine des Aufsehers. Die Arbeiter bitten den Aufseher, zu melden, dass {mf|ein Adliger|eine Adlige} von den Oberdecks sich hier unten verirrt hat. Durch {mf|sein|ihr} Auftreten und Verhalten sticht {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} wirklich aus den bescheidenen Bewohnern der Unterdecks hervor. Als {mf|er|sie} wieder auf der Brücke angelangt ist, lobt die Voxmeisterin den Imperator der Menschheit und erklärt, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} in einer Anomalie gefangen war, durch die Personen auf dem Schiff aus unerklärlichen Gründen die Plätze getauscht haben. Es wurde augenblicklich ein Rettungstrupp losgeschickt, um {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} zu retten, doch {mf|seine|ihre} Freunde von den Unterdecks haben {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} schon geholfen, wieder an {mf|seinen|ihren} rechten Platz zurückzukehren.

languages.text: Les gens en haillons, qui ont apprécié votre agréable compagnie vous accompagnent jusqu'à la cabine du superviseur de la baie. Les ouvriers demandent au superviseur de signaler la présence d'un noble venu des ponts supérieurs. Votre prestance et vos manières vous font effectivement sortir du lot, au milieu de ces humbles citoyens des ponts inférieurs. Lorsque vous retrouvez enfin votre pont, le Maître-Vox loue l'Empereur de l'humanité et explique que vous avez été victime d'une anomalie qui a interverti les positions des individus à bord du vaisseau. Une équipe de secours avait été dépêchée immédiatement pour retrouver Votre Seigneurie, mais vos amis des ponts inférieurs vous avaient déjà permis de revenir à bon port.
languages.original_text: The ragged people, who have thoroughly enjoyed your pleasant company, walk with you to the bay supervisor's cabin. The workers ask the supervisor to report a stray noble from the upper decks. Your poise and manners do make you stand out from the humble denizens of the lower decks. When you are restored to the bridge, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity and explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to retrieve {mf|Your Lordship|Your Ladyship}, but your friends from the lower decks have already helped the Lord Captain back to where {mf|he|she} belongs.

traits.locale_text: Les gens en haillons, qui ont apprécié votre agréable compagnie vous accompagnent jusqu'à la cabine du superviseur de la baie. Les ouvriers demandent au superviseur de signaler la présence d'un noble venu des ponts supérieurs. Votre prestance et vos manières vous font effectivement sortir du lot, au milieu de ces humbles citoyens des ponts inférieurs. Lorsque vous retrouvez enfin votre pont, le Maître-Vox loue l'Empereur de l'humanité et explique que vous avez été victime d'une anomalie qui a interverti les positions des individus à bord du vaisseau. Une équipe de secours avait été dépêchée immédiatement pour retrouver Votre Seigneurie, mais vos amis des ponts inférieurs vous avaient déjà permis de revenir à bon port.

languages.text: Sefil görünümlü insanlar, keyif aldıkları bu sohbetin ardından seni bölme yöneticisinin kabinine kadar götürüyor. İşçiler, yöneticiden üst güvertelerden "kaybolmuş bir soyluyu" bildirmesini istiyor. Tavırların ve zarif davranışların, seni alt güvertelerin alçak gönüllü sakinlerinden farklı kılıyor. Köprüye geri döndüğünde Voks Üstadı, İnsanlığın İmparatoru'na övgüler yağdırıyor ve gemideki insanların açıklanamaz bir şekilde yer değiştirmesine neden olan bir anomaliye yakalandığını açıklıyor. Bir kurtarma ekibi, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ni aramak için hemen görevlendirilmiş ancak alt güvertelerdeki dostların, Lord Kaptan'ı çoktan ait olduğu yere ulaştırmayı başarıyor.
languages.original_text: The ragged people, who have thoroughly enjoyed your pleasant company, walk with you to the bay supervisor's cabin. The workers ask the supervisor to report a stray noble from the upper decks. Your poise and manners do make you stand out from the humble denizens of the lower decks. When you are restored to the bridge, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity and explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to retrieve {mf|Your Lordship|Your Ladyship}, but your friends from the lower decks have already helped the Lord Captain back to where {mf|he|she} belongs.
